name: Every Extend Extra - Pico 8 Edition
description:
Every Extend Extra

Every Extend Extra (EEE) is a demake of a PSP game by the same name about purposefully detonating your ship to cause chain reactions in the enemies. Collect quicken powerups to make the game faster, and get the biggest chain you can!

Features:
  • 4 songs by Gruber from the Pico Tunes Volume 2 pack
  • Multiple backgrounds
  • 5 (or so, I honestly forget) different enemies that shoot annoying bullets!
  • Death!
Controls:
  • Arrow Keys to move
  • X to detonate your ship
  • Z + X to charge a detonation and slow down your ship

Collect quickens to speed up enemies

Kill yellow enemies and minibosses to drop a time pickup

Don't run out of ships, don't get hit, and don't run out of time.

Good luck
